\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 75659}

\subsection*{Weaker Than I Expected}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Eruntero}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 0.5 g & oral & Salvia divinorum & tea\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 65.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I decided to try salvia tea. I put 1g of 5x extract to boiling water kept it boiling for 10 minutes. I made up 2 cups. I gave one to my brother and drank one by myself. I was very bitter, so I put some honey into it.



After few minutes I felt somehow relaxed and clean-minded. After about 10 next minutes I begin to feel a bit sleepy. But this was weak and could possibly be even produced with placebo effect.



I expected it to be much stronger.

\end{document}
